name: Github Tutorial
content:
GitHub functions as a sort of social media site for developers and programmers. It allows your work to get out in front of the public. It is one of the largest coding communities around, so using it can provide wide exposure for you and your projects.

Pre-Requisites

Just you and your will to learn!

What would you gain after completing all the milestones?

Clear understanding of the ins and outs of using GitHub
Mastery of how and when to use the different services provided by GitHub
Knowledge of collaborating using GitHub.
